job_description:
We are looking for a PHP developer who is dedicated to his craft, writes code that is proud of and can hit the ground running. We need you to write beautiful, fast PHP to a high standard, in a timely and scalable way that improves the code-base of our products in meaningful ways.

You will be a part of a creative team that is responsible for all aspects of the ongoing software development from the initial specification, through to developing, testing and launching.

Responsibilities
• Write “clean”, well-designed code
• Produce detailed specifications
• Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimisation and functionality
• Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
• Follow industry best practices
• Perform UI tests to optimise performance.
• Provide training and support to internal teams
• Build reusable code and libraries for future use
• Liaise with developers, designers and system administrators to identify new features
• Follow emerging technologies
• Excellent analytical and time management skills
• Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude
• Develop and deploy new features to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary
• Should know how to manage and configure hosting environments- AWS and cloud hosting services like Google Cloud

Requirements
• Proven software development experience in PHP
• Understanding of open source projects like Joomla, Drupal, Wikis, Laravel, Yii, osCommerce, etc
• Good knowledge of GitHub.
• Hands on experience with programming languages like Java, Ruby, PHP and Python
• Working knowledge of CMS framework
• In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
• Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX, frameworks etc
• Good knowledge of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services
• Experience in common third-party APIs (Google, Facebook, Ebay etc)
• Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas.
• BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject

YetiTech Ltd is Expanding & We Want You!   

   Exciting Career Opportunities in Pakistan!

At YetiTech Ltd, we are pioneering new frontiers in technology and innovation. As we expand our operations into Pakistan, we are eager to welcome new talents to our growing team across multiple disciplines. Join us and be part of a company that is setting new standards in the tech industry.

We are currently hiring for the following positions:
• MERN Stack Developer
• Laravel Backend Developer
• React.js Frontend Developer
• Quality Assurance Specialist
• Project Manager
• HubSpot Specialist
• Flutter/Dart Developer
• Operations / Success Manager

Why Choose YetiTech?
• Innovation at the Forefront: We are not just about software; we are about innovating solutions that reshape how businesses operate.
• Flexibility & Growth: Enjoy the flexibility of remote work with potential transitions to onsite roles in Pakistan, perfect for fostering collaboration and innovation.
• Dynamic Culture: Work alongside a team of passionate professionals in a culture that celebrates creativity, innovation, and continuous learning.

Ideal Candidates:

We are looking for dynamic individuals who are passionate about technology and innovation. Candidates should thrive in fast-paced environments, possess excellent problem-solving skills, and align with our core values of excellence and innovation.

How to Apply:

If you are ready to take on a challenge and make an impact, we would love to hear from you. Please apply through our careers page by choosing your desired open position.

   Deadline: 30th April, 2024.

   Visit our careers page for more details and application instructions:https://www.yetitech.nz/careers

Job brief

We are looking for an outstanding Web Developer to be responsible for the coding, innovative design, and layout of our website. Web developer responsibilities include building our website from concept all the way to completion from the bottom up, fashioning everything from the home page to site layout and function.
Responsibilities

Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices
Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices
Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs
Create and maintain software documentation
Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site
Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities
Cooperate with web designers to match visual design intent
Requirements

Proven working experience in web programming
Top-notch programming skills and in-depth knowledge of modern HTML/CSS
Familiarity with at least one of the following programming languages: PHP, ASP.NET, Javascript, or Ruby on Rails
A solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management, and best development practices
Adequate knowledge of relational database systems, Object-Oriented Programming, and web application development
Hands-on experience with network diagnostics, network analytics tools
Basic knowledge of the Search Engine Optimization process
Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem-solving skills
Strong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelines and budgets with business acumen
Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment, learn rapidly, and master diverse web technologies and techniques.
BS in computer science or a related field

The Role

As a Full Stack Developer at Spixay, you'll be at the intersection of creativity and technology, working on both frontend and backend development. You'll collaborate closely with our design and product teams to develop, launch, and maintain features for our web applications. Your expertise in Laravel, React, and ideally DevOps practices will play a pivotal role in advancing our technology and deploying scalable and efficient solutions.

Responsibilities
• Design and develop new features and applications using Laravel, React, and modern development tools.
• Maintain and improve the performance of existing applications.
• Ensure code quality, sustainability, and scalability.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Implement security and data protection measures.
• Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in web development and DevOps practices.
• Assist in the deployment process and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline.
• Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software.

Requirements
• Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
• Proficiency in front-end languages and frameworks (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React).
• Strong expertise in back-end development with Laravel.
• Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, PostgreSQL.
• Experience with DevOps practices, including automation tools, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and CI/CD pipelines, is highly desirable.
• Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
• A knack for problem-solving and a passion for learning new technologies.
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field, or equivalent work experience. (not required)
• Solid understanding of RESTful APIs and web services.
• Working with tracking tool, mostly in the office, we also offer remote.
• Knowledge of agile development including ability and experience of work with project management tools like Jira, Miro or others.
• Weekly reports for the project manager, each Monday prepare what you done a week before, what’s the issues and the plan for upcoming week.

Experience Required
• Laravel (5+ years experience)
• React (5+ years experience)
• MySQL (5+ years experience)
• Experience with version control systems such as Git.
• Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

Benefits
• Competitive salary and equity package.
• Flexible working hours and remote work options.
• Professional development allowance.
• Generous vacation policy and paid time off.
• A dynamic and inclusive team culture.

Location

Must be located in Lahore, Pakistan, and able to work in-office as required.

How to Apply

Please send your resume, a brief cover letter, and any relevant portfolio links (GitHub, past projects) to careers@spixay.com.pk or directly here on the LinkedIn. In your cover letter, explain why you’re the perfect fit for this role and how you can contribute to Spixay.

Spixay is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

job_title: SEO Specialist, Web Developer Senior, Guest Post Specialist
job_description:
The ideal candidate will analyze, review, and implement changes to websites so they are optimized for search engines. This candidate will be able to implement actionable strategies that will improve site visibility. There should be Well-known information about new core updates from Google.

GBOB Specialists should be proficient in communication and analysis

Web Developers should be proficient in HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, WordPress, and Woocommerce.

Responsibilities

Review and analyze client sites for areas needing improvement

Prepare detailed strategy reports

Create and launch campaigns

Improve clients 'rank' in major search engines

Determine and develop user requirements for systems in production, to ensure maximum usability

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or Related Field

1+ years' of technical experience

Strong analytical skills

Understanding of all search engines and functions as well as marketing

Excellent verbal and written communication skills
• Excellent Keyword Researcher

Company Name: WorldCall Telecom Limited, A GlobalTech Company.
Position: IP Network Team Lead / Executive
Location: Lahore, Pakistan

Role Overview:
We are currently seeking an experienced and dynamic IP Core Network Team Lead/Executive to manage our IP-based network operation centers and ensure the smooth and secure operation of our network infrastructure.

Responsibilities:
• Configure and troubleshoot Cisco, Juniper, and MikroTik routers and switches.
• Define and manage DPLCs, P2P, E1's, VLANs, MPLS, OSPF, BGP, STP, ROA, and other network protocols and technologies.
• Set up and manage network monitoring solutions like CACTI, MRTG, and PRTG on Linux platform.
• Ensure network security and implement best practices.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless network operations.
• Mentor and train team members on network-related tasks.
• Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in IP networking.

Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Electronics and Computer Systems.
• 3 to 5 years of experience in managing IP-based network operation centers.
• Proficiency in configuring Cisco, Juniper, and MikroTik routers and switches.
• Strong troubleshooting skills for network and routing issues.
• CCNA, CCNP, CCIE, and related certifications are a plus.
• Excellent communication and leadership abilities.

Send your profiles to jobs.hr@worldcall.pk

Job Type: Full-time

Application Question(s):
• Do you have Bachelor's degree in Electronics and Computer Systems?
• Do you have 3 to 5 years of experience in managing IP-based network operation centers?
• Are you able to move Lahore for an interview and joining?

The ideal candidate is a creative problem solver who will work in coordination with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain our next generation websites and web tools. You must be comfortable working as part of a team while taking the initiative to take lead on new innovations and projects.

Responsibilities
• Revise, edit, proofread & optimize web content
• Work with cross-functionally to enhance overall user experience of our platforms
• Own various design tasks involved in the web development life cycle from start to finish

Qualifications
• Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science
• At least 1 - 2 years' of experience using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Shopify
• Proficiency in at least one server-side technology (Java, PHP, NodeJS, Python, Ruby)
• Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work

Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for a Web Developer in Lahore. The Web Developer will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications and ensuring seamless user experience.

Qualifications
• Strong proficiency in ASP.NET WEB API CORE & MVC CORE
• Strong proficiency in RAZOR VIEW PAGES & HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JQuery
• Experience with any front end framework like react, vue, blazor or angular will be a plus.
• Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code

Salary
• 80K-100K (based on experience)

We are seeking a talented and experienced Full Stack Developer proficient in JavaScript, Python, and Django to join our Company Brand Surge.The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications and platforms that drive our clients' digital marketing initiatives. This role requires expertise in both front-end and back-end development, as well as a strong understanding of digital marketing concepts and best practices.

Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain web applications and platforms using JavaScript, Python, and Django framework.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement digital marketing solutions that meet client requirements and business objectives.
• Implement responsive and user-friendly front-end interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks such as React or Angular.
• Design and optimize database schemas and queries to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval.
• Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following best practices and coding standards.
• Conduct code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to identify and resolve technical issues.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in web development and digital marketing.

Requirements:
• 1 to 2 Years work experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role, with expertise in JavaScript, Python, and Django framework.
• Strong proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as modern front-end frameworks like React or Angular.
• Experience with database design and development using SQL and NoSQL databases.
• Familiarity with version control systems such as Git and code collaboration platforms like GitHub.
• Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work independently or collaboratively in a team environment.
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is preferred.
• Candidates from FAST, COMSAT, LUMS, and PUCIT institutes are highly preferred.

Benefits:
• Competitive salary based on experience
• Paid time off and holidays
• Professional development opportunities
• Collaborative and innovative work environment

Location: Faisal Town,Near Jinnah Hospital,Lahore

Job Type: Full Time
